name: Spirit Land
description:
SPIRIT LAND
Possesses special features of a top RPG Southeast Asia. PLAY NOW!
The Leader Of Endless Battles & Becoming The Legend In Our Story
Special features :
1. Eight Classes - Expressing Freedom your level
With eight classes, the hero will freely choose suitable for the hero’s personality. The hero
will be free to show off skills in each class. But remember that each class will contain its
special powers and need a hero to explore!
2. Three Realms - Battle of the Leader
Three realms battle with many special stories, and even more unique with the participation
of many other heroes in Southeast Asia. Join now to become proclaimed king and become
the king of the game world Spirit Land now!
3. Stylish Fashions and Mounts
Great war and show power, but do not forget to show other heroes the outfits, fashion
collections and collections of super cool mounts in Spirit Land.
4. Unique incarnation features
It rates the feature as special, helping the hero increase power to win at top PK battles.
Besides, the appearance of a special deity feature is a plus point of Spirit Land in the world
of role-playing games in Southeast Asia. Precious to experience it.
5. Free Trade – Free Play
The hero will have a significant experience when selling and buying items, pieces that the
hero wants to own.
World Spirit Land has officially launched with other features for heroes to explore!
Download this new game right away to get the feeling of asserting yourself in the Southeast
Asia MMORPG share!
